description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5b1r5","text":"The Qiagen DNEasy PowerLyzer PowerSoil Kit is widely used in DNA based sample processing and extraction procedures. However, dryland soils are typically high in salts and secondary metabolites, which can cause interferences with A 260/230 quality of extracted DNA. We modified the Qiagen manufacturer protocol to account for high soil salinity by including additional washing steps and extra centrifugation time. Quality DNA was extracted from agricultural soils using this protocol which passed the quality checks for next generation amplicon sequencing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ebs05","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: New Mexico Department of Agriculture Specialty Crop Block Grant

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6nus3","text":"Soil samples should be stored cold, at least -20 C (ideally at -80 C).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fltp","text":"Fill a 12 ml homogenization vial approximately 2/3 full with soil (Spex SamplePrep 6133PC-T).  Include three 6.35 mm diameter chrome steel beads (BioSpec Products Cat. No. 11079635c).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":7,"length":25},{"key":1,"offset":66,"length":26},{"key":2,"offset":145,"length":37}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EA6A882092CB11ED822B514E39B56229","url":"https://www.coleparmer.com/i/spex-sampleprep-6133pc-t-grinding-vials-polycarbonate-reinforced-with-slip-on-cap-12-ml-100-pk/0457764"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"1F29A50092CC11ED822B514E39B56229","url":"https://www.coleparmer.com/i/spex-sampleprep-6133pc-t-grinding-vials-polycarbonate-reinforced-with-slip-on-cap-12-ml-100-pk/0457764"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"913DD770766F11EDA1CBD1FAD3A231DF","url":"https://www.biospec.com/products/chrome-steel-beads"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a20dt","text":"Homogenize at 4000 rpm for     using the SPEX SamplePrep 1200 Genolyte homogenizer with the single-vial attachment for 12mL vials.  Re-homogenize as needed at 4000 rpm for   to avoid the soil from thawing and sticking together.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":28,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":41,"length":29},{"key":2,"offset":92,"length":37},{"key":3,"offset":172,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8pho6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"A6C03E90560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"52EF1100766F11EDA1CBD1FAD3A231DF","url":"https://www.spexsampleprep.com/1200genolyte"}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"2720AF20910911ED810BD5223D931A40","url":"https://www.coleparmer.com/i/spex-sampleprep-1218-genolyte-homogenizer-vial-holder-1-x-12-ml-vial-04577-64-1-ea/0457535"}},"3":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":10,"guid":"B4066070560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5h0tv","text":"Add approximately   of soil sample by volume to the PowerBead Tube provided.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":18,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"df031","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"80","error":false,"guid":"BAE6C880560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7075m","text":"Add   of PowerBead Solution to the PowerBead Tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"a6soa","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"C4575150560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1ai4r","text":"Add   of Solution C1 and invert several times or vortex briefly.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"60","error":false,"guid":"CF85DDD0560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4qsd1","text":"Bead beating: Spex 1200 Genolyte homogenizer: Place the PowerLyzer Glass Bead Tubes into the tube holder attachment for the homogenizer (holds 6). The PowerBead Tubes must be balanced on the tube holder. Run the samples at a time and RPM suitable for your soil type. For our samples, 3000 rpm for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":93,"length":52},{"key":1,"offset":297,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bf8p6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"guid":"EFBEFAF0910811ED810BD5223D931A40","url":"https://www.coleparmer.com/i/spex-sampleprep-1210-genolyte-homogenizer-vial-holder-6-x-2-ml-vials-1-ea/0450006"}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":35,"guid":"D7AC8180560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d6f1d","text":"Centrifuge Bead Tubes at 10,000 x rcf for  . Note: We increased the centrifugation time to ensure that no sediment/soil is left in suspension, improving DNA quality downstream.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":42,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8eiho","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"E17AE1C0560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4so1r","text":"Transfer the supernatant to a clean 2 ml collection tube. Note: Expect  . Supernatant may still contain some soil particles.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"73iuo","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"400-500","error":false,"guid":"E991F510560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9g3m6","text":"Add   of Solution C2 and vortex for 5 sec. Incubate at 2-8°C for 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"l5as","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"250","error":false,"guid":"F314F470560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2tg1s","text":"Centrifuge the tubes at 10,000 x rcf for 1 min. Avoiding the pellet, transfer up to   of supernatant to a clean 2 ml collection tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":84,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5omb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"600","error":false,"guid":"F9E15F50560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"369si","text":"Add    of Solution C3 and vortex briefly. Incubate at 2-8°C for   .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":64,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fdi4n","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"200","error":false,"guid":"FEBF67B0560711EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":300,"guid":"03CAE8B0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7q7d3","text":"Centrifuge the tubes at 10,000 x rcf for  . Avoiding the pellet, transfer up to   of supernatant to a clean 2 ml collection tube. Note: We increased the centrifugation time to ensure that no sediment/soil is left in suspension, improving DNA quality downstream.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":80,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8kju7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":180,"guid":"08C3CC10560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"750","error":false,"guid":"0F17F9B0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bd4nk","text":"Add   of Solution C4 to the supernatant and vortex for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":55,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b9m4t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1200","error":false,"guid":"15FCF5A0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":5,"guid":"1A8D5330560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ka5a","text":"Load   of the supernatant onto a MB Spin Column and centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for  . Discard the flow through and add an additional   of supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":5,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":83,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":133,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3ej9s","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"675","error":false,"guid":"20BA97E0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"26B078E0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"675","error":false,"guid":"2A8304B0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3acp8","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for  . Load the remaining supernatant onto the MB Spin Column and centrifuge at 10,000 rcf for  . Note: A total of three loads for each sample processed are required.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":122,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"24hhv","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"2D92B5B0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"30A37820560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4f349","text":"Add 500 μl of Solution C5 and centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for  . Discard the flow through. Repeat this step once more: add   of Solution C5 and centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for  . Discard the flow through.  Note: We repeated this washing step to minimize salt contamination, which helps improve DNA A260/230 values.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":61,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":122,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":174,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4omb8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"33BA06F0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"500","error":false,"guid":"38B75720560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"3608B1E0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2oe0u","text":"Centrifuge again at 10,000 x rcf for  .","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":37,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bpku6","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":60,"guid":"3C5CB870560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cnmae","text":"Carefully place the spin filter in a clean 2 ml collection tube. Avoid splashing any Solution C5 onto the MB Spin Column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"avm6e","text":"Add   of Solution C6 to the center of the white filter membrane. Note: We used the minimum recommended amount of Solution C6 to yield greatest DNA concentrations.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":4,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"969q4","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"50","error":false,"guid":"405DCE50560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"25in5","text":"Centrifuge at 10,000 x rcf for  . Discard the MB Spin Column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"98mkd","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"duration":30,"guid":"433B72D0560811EDB1460571B4104F2D","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"6jm5c","text":"The DNA is now ready for downstream applications.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
